dcterms:creator: Y. Xian
B. Schiele
Z. Akata
dcterms:description: A dataset for zero-shot learning that consists of 50 animal classes, with a total of 37,322 images and an average of 746 images per class. The dataset is used to evaluate methods in the context of unsupervised open domain recognition.
dcterms:title: I2AwA

dcterms:creator: W. Li
L. Wang
W. Li
E. Agustsson
L. Van Gool
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for visual learning and understanding from web data, consisting of a validation set with 5,000 classes and 294,009 images. It is used as a target domain for evaluating methods in the context of unsupervised open domain recognition.
dcterms:title: I2WebV
